publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7591 David Whitton: Call of Success from Kirkintilloch—That the Parliament congratulates customer service advisor Suzanne Murray from Kirkintilloch on her success at the Scottish Modern Apprenticeship Awards 2010; notes that she won the non-traditional sector category for what it considers to be her outstanding work as a customer service apprentice at BT’s Alexander Bain House in Glasgow; congratulates all of the finalists in this year’s awards, and welcomes BT’s continued support and promotion of apprenticeships across Scotland.
S3M-7591 Call of Success from Kirkintilloch (lodged on 13 December 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-7591 Call of Success from Kirkintilloch (lodged on 13 December 2010) Sarah Boyack*

S3M-7591 David Whitton: Call of Success from Kirkintilloch—That the Parliament congratulates customer service advisor Suzanne Murray from Kirkintilloch on her success at the Scottish Modern Apprenticeship Awards 2010; notes that she won the non-traditional sector category for what it considers to be her outstanding work as a customer service apprentice at BT’s Alexander Bain House in Glasgow; congratulates all of the finalists in this year’s awards, and welcomes BT’s continued support and promotion of apprenticeships across Scotland. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Sarah Boyack
